attributes.action: Apologise for allowing the Olympic Flame to be carried through London and Censure the Metropolitan Police Chief for the policing tactics employed during the torch procession.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Apologise for allowing the Olympic Flame to be carried through London and Censure the Metropolitan Police Chief for the policing tactics employed during the torch procession.

China has an appalling record when it comes to human rights violations, a phenomenon which it successfully exported to Britain this weekend when the government not only allowed the Olympic Flame to be carried through London in the face of massive international condemnation, but also allowed Chinese security guards, under the protection of the Metropolitan Police, to assault British subjects asserting their democratic right to protest. The ITV News coverage also clearly showed assaults by Met Police Officers on the press and protesters and I hope the police will use the footage taken to discipline those involved.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
